metadata.name: BTC Fixed Yield Reactor
metadata.description:
The owner of this official 88mph's anthem NFT will receive 0.0088 $WBTC + 0.97% fixed APR + 14.85% $MPH APR back by November 11, 2021. Use this NFT to withdraw the WBTC deposit + interest generated after the maturity date is reached.

In addition, the owner will receive an NFT representing the vested MPH rewards tied to the WBTC deposit in order to claim an additional yield of 0.15 MPH at maturity (+14.85% APR at current MPH value).

The total value available at maturity (incl. MPH) will be ~$511

"BTC Fixed Yield Reactor" has been commissioned in October 2021 from "ManWithNoName", a 88mph artist partner. On this live art piece, The BTC reactor change its form over the time, from deposit date to maturation date.
When maturation date comes, the reactor preserves the final form.

This is an experiment.

* Deposit NFTs are not burnt at any point, to preserve their artistic value. In other words, you can withdraw safely their intrinsic value without damaging the creative content. A nice souvenir from 88mph.
